name:
Digger Dan
& Kaboom
description:
Digger Dan has always loved
digging. That’s probably how he got
his name although nobody knows for
sure. He also loves gems and he just
happens to have found a ton of them!
However, there is a problem, all the
gems are in some pretty nasty caves
so you are going to have to help Dan
get them out. Dan has sent Kaboom,
his pet gopher into the caves to find
the best place to start, but he hasn’t
returned. Kaboom has a habit of
falling asleep though, so it looks like
Dan’s going to have to rescue him
too!
